mapper.select: select p.postno as postNo, title, postimg from post p inner join (select * from member m inner join userlike u on m.userno = u.userno where m.userno = #{userNo}) mu on p.postno = mu.postno WHERE p.DELETEDDATE is null
select pw from member where userno = ${userNo}
mapper.update: update member set deleteddate = sysdate where userno = ${userNo}
